TopicTitle: Your opinion on moon landing conspiracy theorists?

Articles.Content:
So, what do you guys think about people who say that the Apollo moon landings were faked? Personally, I find their "proof" to be rather strange (and entirely incorrect), but what do you guys think?

I, for one, definitely liked Buzz's reaction to being harassed by Bart Sibrel...

Conspiracy theories are not allowed here...however, I don't know if a thread "what to answer to those crazy guys" will be tolerated by the mods.

Here's a very detailed page about those myths and why they are wrong: http://www.braeunig.us/space/index.htm

There's an answer to all and every proof conspiracy theorists come up with, most of them rather easy. So don't be irritated if someone throws wild claims about the moon landings at you. They are plain wrong. Armstrong, Aldrin, and all that followed walked on the moon. Period.

Edited July 6, 2013 by philly_idle
